gui

Class BasicStatsGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.BasicStatsGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    View

    public class BasicStatsGUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements View
    Create a simple GUI that includes: - a text field and a button that allows the user to enter numbers. - a button that allows the user to clear all entered numbers. - a panel with labels and text fields for count, median, and mean. - a text area that shows all numbers. For the MVC architecture pattern, these are the views and controllers.
